verbose_text: It has been suggested, however, that HIPK2 enhances the transcriptional activity of CBP by antagonizing the repressive action of cell cycle regulatory domain 1 (CRD1), located between amino acids 977 and 1076 in HPIK2 independent manner.
evidence:
HIPK2 enhances the transcriptional activity of CBP by antagonizing the
repressive action of cell cycle
